localString.value: The sofa seems warm and inviting, perfect for a short nap.
The smells of hickory smoke and fresh bread waft out of the earthen oven, making your mouth water.
Bound in iron and with a heavy lock, this heavy chest was obviously meant to protect something of value.
The antique drawer pulls are touched by rust and the drawers themselves fit ill within their sockets. It seems the damp air has not been kind to this piece.
The torch paints its environs in warmer hues. You find yourself grateful for its glow.
